name: Shin Theme Park
overview: Shin Theme Park (新　テーマパーク) is a Simulation game, developed and published by Electronic Arts Victor, which was released in Japan in 1997 for the Sega Saturn. It is a largely undocumented variant of Theme Park, presumably tweaked to make it appeal more towards the Japanese market. At its core, it appears to be the same game, though the introduction sequence has been replaced, and big chunks of the visuals were redrawn.
